title: SCANDAL Discography (Japanese Band)
description:
SCANDAL is a J-Pop, Pop-Rock and "Rock-Girl" band from Osaka, Japan, formed in August 2006 by four high school girls of "CALESS vocal and dance school". They are HARUNA ONO (the lead and Main Vocalits / Guitarist) TOMOMI OGAWA (Second vocalist and bass), MAMI SASAZAKI (Main Guitarist and vocals/chorus), and RINA SUZUKI (Drums).
